text:
UNIVERSITY OF CALIFOR

 

IA, SAN DIEGO

 

 

 

G.N.Schrauzer

DEPARTMENT OF CHEMISTRY, 6.015
TAJOLLA, CALIFORNIA 92093

Mr.W.T.Hoyt

The Council for Tobacco Research-USA Inc.

110 East 59th Street

New York, N.Y. 10082

September 17, 1981

Dear Hr. Hoyt:

 

1 am writing to request financial support in the amount of $ 20,000
for a two-year study, which is outlined in the enclosed research proposal
Nselenium in Tobacco and in Tobacco Smoke".

If the Council agrees to fund this project, please send any checks .to
the UCSD Foundation, University of California, San Diego, La Jolla, Calif.
92093.

We would like to receive these funds in two equal installments over _
the two year period. | would appreciate it if the letter accompanying { 7
the first installment were to state that "these unrestricted funds are~~
presented to Dr.G.N.Schrauzer to support programs under his direction"

   

Yours sincerely,

BN oer -

G.N.Schrauzer
Professor of Chemistry

 

CTR SP-FILES 022473
